summary: Defines which packages should be installed for a specific machine model.

structure.name: <MODEL_ID>
structure.description: Machine or hardware model identifier. Must match the system model exactly.

structure.name: Packages
structure.description: Fixed job key for the Packages tool. Do not rename or remove.

structure.name: <PACKAGE_NAME>
structure.description: Name of a package to install. Add or remove entries here.

notes: Only add or remove package names.
Package entries must be valid package identifiers for the system.
